attributes.action: save the Vale Street games area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: West Norwood is a well-known desert as far as children's play areas are concerned.  Briefly, there was an extremely popular basketball court on Vale Street, as part of the plans to place a dustcart depot on Vale Street.  This play area has now been sold off to developers. We strongly oppose the depot plans and in particular want to see the restoration of the play area.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
